website_summaries.verdict: 6-pack of effective doorknob covers with special ergonomic locking design for improved tamper resistance.
pros: Child-safety solution for several doors in this pack of 6
Has a simple, elegant design, subtly blending with home décor
Ergonomic locking design wraps around entire knob for better tamper resistance
Easy for adults to install or remove
Set of 4 clear childproof corner protectors included
cons: These covers do their job –  maybe too well – adults find them a bit difficult to remove
But little ones can't take them off, keeping them safe

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy & quick to install
customer_reviews.text: Quick to install and 18-month-old proof. Also easily removable for adults when you figure out where to squeeze, but toddler hands are too small for that. The included bonus corner bumpers feel very soft. As with all baby proofing, it can slow down those with age or arthritis, but these have proved successful.
customer_reviews.author: Unhandled Exception

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great price
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly (sometimes even too much!). There’s no way ankid can open those. I thought my daughter would have been upset but we let 2 doors where she can practice open and close and we had her help us installing them (3 seconds each) and she’s happy so it’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping our toddler out of certain rooms or from being able to open certain doors. They are a tad tricky to remove, but once you figure it out it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo m arellano

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered fast and in good condition. I loved these door knob covers, easy to assemble and are very secure. They definitely do the job they are meant for. I will be buying more, and recommend this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: my daughter has these and they are life savers but ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has these and they are life savers but my house has very old door knobs which are small so the the covers did not work and I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: ladyesheryl

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple brands before and these by far are my favorite. Other brands have failed to keep my toddlers out but these do the job great! They were easy to assemble and fit on every door knob I tried them on. 5 stars and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for the little one!!
customer_reviews.text: As we have a walking grandbaby she can just reach the backdoor knob where we have a inground pool , this was step one , protect the back door. We ordered the 6 pack to give to her Mother for other doors in her house. Pool alam is next
customer_reviews.author: Todd McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & effective
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in good condition. Quick and easy product to apply. My 2 year old toddler gave them a work out the first day. Product held up perfectly and prevented him from opening doors.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: We really like the covers it keeps our toddler out of the pantry or closets that have things he shouldnt be playing with and of course keeps him from leaving the house from our back doors.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Gives me a piece of mind knowing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Gives me a piece of mind knowing kids can’t get into trouble and it’s even better that it has the table corner covers even more excited about those ! Seller is great !
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: These made a great baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: These made a great baby shower gift! The mother-to-be was very happy to receive something that no one else thought of and is also very important to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Product seems reliable
customer_reviews.text: Product does what its supposed to with no problem. Love product and love I feel like my son is safe from opening doors.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great protective doorknob covers
customer_reviews.text: This is the best child protective door knob covers I’ve tried so far, my baby cannot open it, they stay on and are simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as described and quick delivery. Simple to put on the door and so far so good! My two year old put them to the test for the first time a few days ago, and they worked! Definitely a product I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Sneaky Niece
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They work awesome for keeping my mischievous niece from opening doors. She loves sneaking snacks out from the pantry so this is a great deterrent. At first it was hard to put the knob covers on but once you align the notches right they click in place fairly easily. They hold so well that it’s actually hard for adults to take off. This is reassuring because as my niece gets older I know she wont be able to just rip them off. The table corners are a great bonus too. Four wont be enough for now but as my niece gets taller we will end up purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: not  child proof
customer_reviews.text: very easy doe child to figure out how to open door even with it on the knob
customer_reviews.author: driss zine

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful way of protection my kids. Great product to have and give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Skin and Roses
